elements.text:
HDSA: GINA Overview: Want to learn how the Genetic Information Nondiscrimination Act (GINA) protects you from genetic discrimination? Check out this resource from HDSA. https://hdsa.org/living-with-hd/gina/

Genome Statute and Legislation Database: Whether you're interested in health insurance nondiscrimination or genetic privacy laws, the Genome Statute and Legislation Database has you covered. https://www.genome.gov/about-genomics/policy-issues/Genome-Statute-Legislation-Database

National Human Genome Research Institute: Genetic Discrimination: Explore how the Genetic Information Nondiscrimination Act (GINA) protects people with HD or PD from being treated unfairly. https://www.genome.gov/about-genomics/policy-issues/Genetic-Discrimination

GINA Fact Sheet from the US Equal Employment Opportunity Commission: Check out this fact sheet to see how the Genetic Information Nondiscrimination Act (GINA) helps protect people with HD or PD at work. https://www.eeoc.gov/laws/guidance/fact-sheet-genetic-information-nondiscrimination-act
